name.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Audio Recorder Online - Capture Screen Audio
name.am: Record Voice - Record Computer Audio Online
name.bn: Record Audio - Audio Recorder From Computer
name.de: Audio Capture On Chrome - Free Audio Recorder
name.pt_BR: Chrome Audio Recorder - Capture Audio Online

short.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Record audio from tabs and microphone, with support for pause, preview, and save to computer.
short.am,fi: A free record voice, simple audio recorder allows you to conduct voice record on your computer.
short.bn: A free tool to record audio on your computer, use it for free voice recorder.
short.de: A free Chrome audio capture tool, no download needed, just install and you can record audio.
short.nl: Record and save audio easily with our WAV web-based online speech and voice recorder. with support for pause, preview, and save to‚Ä¶
short.pt_BR: Chrome audio recorder enables seamless audio capture within the Chrome browser. with support for pause, preview, and save to‚Ä¶

long.ar:
üéµRecord audio from tabs and microphone, with support for pause, preview, and save to computer.üéµ
üèÜThis extension can easily help users record audio from tabs and microphones, offering features such as pause during recording, preview of the recording results, and saving the output files to your computer, currently supporting Mp3, webm, and wav formats. Fast, simple, efficient - perfectly capturing every sound moment.

üî• Features:
‚óè Unlimited recording duration, effortlessly record online meetings, remote courses, live concerts, or everyday conversations with just one click.
‚óè Supports separate recording of tab and microphone audio.
‚óè Offers functions to pause, preview, and save audio files.
‚óè Supports saving files in different audio formats, such as MP3, WAV, Webm, etc.
‚óè Privacy first, recordings are directly exported to your computer, we do not store your data or recordings.

üéôÔ∏è How to use:
1. Click the Add to Chrome button to install the Record Audio extension.
2. Open the tab where you wish to capture audio.
3. Open the plugin, select the type of recording: tab audio, microphone audio
4. Click Start Tab Recording to begin.
5. You can cancel, pause, and save the audio file at any time during the recording.
6. Preview the audio, choose the audio format and save the file to your device.

‚ùì Q&A:
Q: Is this extension free?
A: Currently, our extension is free, and we have also launched a free AI-generated music service, offering you faster response times, unrestricted access, and priority customer support.

Q: What audio formats does this extension support?
A: This app supports various audio formats, including MP3, WAV, etc., allowing users to choose the saving format according to their needs.

Q: Can it record tab audio and microphone audio at the same time?
A: Yes, this app supports simultaneous recording of tab and microphone audio, giving users flexible recording options.

Q: Can I pause and preview the audio during the recording process?
A: Yes, users can pause the recording at any time, preview the recorded content, and save the file when needed.

Q: Is this app safe and reliable?
A: Yes, we provide a safe and efficient recording function, ensuring users can conveniently save tab and microphone audio, securing data safety and privacy.

‚óè Privacy first, recordings are directly exported to your computer, we do not store your data or recordings.

üéôÔ∏è How to use:
1. Click the Add to Chrome button to install the Record Audio extension.
2. Open the tab where you wish to capture audio.
3. Open the plugin, select the type of recording: tab audio, microphone audio
4. Click Start Tab Recording to begin.
5. You can cancel, pause, and save the audio file at any time during the recording.
6. Preview the audio, choose the audio format and save the file to your device.

‚ùì Q&A:
Q: Is this extension free?
A: Currently, our extension is free, and we have also launched a free AI-generated music service, offering you faster response times, unrestricted access, and priority customer support.

Q: What audio formats does this extension support?
A: This app supports various audio formats, including MP3, WAV, etc., allowing users to choose the saving format according to their needs.

Q: Can it record tab audio and microphone audio at the same time?
A: Yes, this app supports simultaneous recording of tab and microphone audio, giving users flexible recording options.

Q: Can I pause and preview the audio during the recording process?
A: Yes, users can pause the recording at any time, preview the recorded content, and save the file when needed.

Q: Is this app safe and reliable?
A: Yes, we provide a safe and efficient recording function, ensuring users can conveniently save tab and microphone audio, securing data safety and privacy.
